questionsAndAnswers.question: What services can I book through this platform?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can book professionals across a wide range of occupations, such as electricians, photographers, tutors, cleaners, movers, and more for specific time slots.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How does item rental work on this platform?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Users can rent items listed by verified owners. Simply search for the item, select the desired rental period, and submit your request. The owner will approve and you’ll receive a confirmation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I list my own services or items for rent?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! Anyone can register as a provider. Once verified, you can list services or items, set availability, pricing, and start earning.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is there a payment system integrated?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we support secure online payments. Customers pay upon booking, and funds are released to the service or item owner after successful completion.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What happens if someone cancels a booking or rental?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Our platform offers a fair cancellation policy. Depending on the timing of the cancellation, you may be eligible for a full or partial refund. Providers may also set specific cancellation rules.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I know the service provider or item owner is trustworthy?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: All providers and renters go through a verification process. Users can also leave ratings and reviews based on their experiences, helping maintain a trusted community.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Are there any service fees involved?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, a small service fee is applied to bookings and rentals to help cover platform maintenance and support. The fee will be displayed before final confirmation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I communicate with the service provider or item owner before booking?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, our platform allows secure messaging between users and providers so you can ask questions, clarify details, and ensure everything is aligned before booking.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if an item I rented gets damaged?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: If an item is returned damaged, the platform’s protection policy and the owner's terms will apply. Users may be liable for repair or replacement costs depending on the situation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is this platform available in all cities?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We are expanding rapidly! Availability may vary by region. You can check service and item availability by entering your location on the homepage.
